name: Hello!
tagline: Diary of a new New Yorker.
body:
### Who am I?
My name is Trishala Neeraj. I am currently pursuing a Masters degree in Information Science at Cornell Tech. I graduated from BITS Pilani a couple of months ago, took a nice vacation with my family, and came to New York City for some more fun! I am going to write about my new experiences here and I promise to try to keep it updated.

### What have I been up to?
The past few weeks have kept me occupied with some very interesting courses that I am taking this semester, interacting with many extremely knowledgeable people and exploring New York! I like working on projects in Data Science. Over the last three years, I developed a huge interest in Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing. You can check out the details of some of my undergraduate projects [here](https://www.linkedin.com/in/trishala-neeraj-169a38126).

### What are some other activities I enjoy?
I love hiking. My best hiking experience was at Old Rag Mountain, Virginia. I like traveling in general; learning about different cultures and trying out different cuisines. 


### How can you contact me?
Email: tn338@cornell.edu 

(NetID: tn338)
